results.title: Alien
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1979
results.brief_description: During its return to the earth, the spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, the crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them…

constellations_other.name: Representation of women in videogames
constellations_other.description: Ms Pac-Man is the first famous female game protagonist, but let's face it – she's just Pac-Man with a bow. This Constellation looks at the history of female representation in videogames.

constellations_other.name: Ladies who own the narrative
constellations_other.description: Despite the lag in making it in mainstream cinema, female action heroes can actually be traced back to the late 19th century in early magic lantern performances of Jane Conquest, who saved both her child and a ship full of men.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1979
results.description: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.
description_for_label: During its return to the earth, commercial spaceship Nostromo intercepts a distress signal from a distant planet. When a three-member team of the crew discovers a chamber containing thousands of eggs on the planet, a creature inside one of the eggs attacks an explorer. The entire crew is unaware of the impending nightmare set to descend upon them when the alien parasite planted inside its unfortunate host is birthed.

results.title: Alice in Wonderland
results.creator_credit: Bill Peet, Walt Disney Productions and Walt Disney Animation Studios
results.brief_description: On a golden afternoon, young Alice follows a White Rabbit, who disappears down a nearby rabbit hole. Quickly following him, she tumbles into the burrow - and enters the merry, topsy-turvy world of Wonderland! Memorable songs and whimsical escapades highlight Alice’s journey, which culminates in a madcap encounter with the Queen of Hearts - and her army of playing cards!

constellations_other.name: MoCaps and rotos
constellations_other.description: Though VFX continues to push boundaries and brings fantastical worlds and creatures to life, there's still a place for classic animation techniques.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bill Peet, Walt Disney Productions and Walt Disney Animation Studios

results.title: ALF
results.creator_credit: Paul Fusco, Bernie Brillstein and Alien Productions
results.brief_description: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with a terran family after crashing into their garage.

constellations_other.name: The power of alternate endings
constellations_other.description: This Constellation about alternate perspectives, dream states, sitcoms and spin-offs was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Daniel Bryan.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Paul Fusco, Bernie Brillstein and Alien Productions
results.description: A furry alien wiseguy comes to live with a terran family after crashing into their garage.

results.title: Akira
results.creator_credit: Hiroshi Ohno, Akira Committee Company Ltd., MBS, Sumitomo Corporation, Toho Co., Studio Fuga, Studio Aoi, TMS Entertainment, Kodansha, Bandai Entertainment Inc., Katsuhiro Otomo, Kazuo Ebisawa, Yuji Ikehata, Koji Ono, Izo Hashimoto, Haruyo Kanesaku, Shunzo Kato, Yutaka Maseba, Yoshimasa Mizuo, Hiroe Tsukamoto and Ryôhei Suzuki
results.brief_description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath that only two teenagers and a group of psychics can stop.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

results.title: Adventure Time
results.creator_credit: Pendleton Ward, Cartoon Network Studios and Frederator Studios
results.brief_description: Hook up with Finn and Jake as they travel the Land of Ooo searching for adventure. But remember, adventure isn’t always easy.

constellations_other.name: Evangelical animation
constellations_other.description: This Constellation exploring animation was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Melanie Kavanagh.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Pendleton Ward, Cartoon Network Studios and Frederator Studios
results.description: Hook up with Finn and Jake as they travel the Land of Ooo searching for adventure. But remember, adventure isn’t always easy. Sometimes you’ve got to battle fire gnomes that torture old ladies, save a smelly hot dog princess from the Ice King, and thaw out a bunch of frozen businessmen. What the cabbage?!

results.title: Across the Universe
results.creator_credit: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
results.brief_description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in America, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation.

constellations_other.name: Hell no, we won't go
constellations_other.description: The cultural, social, psychological and political effects of the Vietnam War have been explored through cinematic classics, musicals and comedies.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Revolution Studios, Team Todd, Gross Entertainment, Sound Films, Matthew Gross, Richard Baratta, Jennifer Todd, Albert Wolsky, Julie Taymor, Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais
results.description: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in the United States, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, who joins the growing anti-war movement. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
description_for_label: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in the United States, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, who joins the growing anti-war movement. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.

results.title: Abra Cadabra
results.brief_description: Dr Cadabra, an eccentric magician, lives in outer space with his son Abra and their pets - Stella the star cat and Zodiac the space dog. When all four are busy elsewhere, two villains, B.L. Z’Bub and Klaw the Rat King, take off with the Cosmic pipe.

results.title: A United Kingdom
results.creator_credit: Film United, Perfect Weekend, Harbinger Pictures, BFI Film Fund, Yoruba Saxon Productions and Pathé
results.headline_credit: Czech Republic, France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
results.brief_description: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments.

constellations_other.name: Royals
constellations_other.description: Royal watchers don't need to visit palaces around the world. There are enough stories about royalty on the silver and small screen to get their fix.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Film United, Perfect Weekend, Harbinger Pictures, BFI Film Fund, Yoruba Saxon Productions and Pathé
results.headline_credit_for_label: Czech Republic, France, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2016
results.description: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments. Seretse and Ruth defied family, Apartheid and empire - their love triumphed over every obstacle flung in their path and in so doing they transformed their nation and inspired the world.
description_for_label: The inspiring true story of Seretse Khama, the King of Bechuanaland (modern Botswana), and Ruth Williams, the London office worker he married in 1948 in the face of fierce opposition from their families and the British and South African governments. Seretse and Ruth defied family, Apartheid and empire - their love triumphed over every obstacle flung in their path and in so doing they transformed their nation and inspired the world.

results.title: A Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy
results.brief_description: Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy was a television special featuring the First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy on a tour of the recently renovated White House.

constellations_other.name: Papa-paparazzi
constellations_other.description: Media attention and paparazzi from the assassination of JFK to Lady Gaga's music video.

results.title_for_label: A Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy
results.description: Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy was a television special featuring the First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy on a tour of the recently renovated White House. It was broadcast on Valentine’s Day, February 14, 1962, on both CBS and NBC, and broadcast four days later on ABC. The program was the first ever First Lady televised tour of the White House, and has since been considered the first prime-time documentary specifically designed to appeal to a female audience.
description_for_label: Tour of the White House with Mrs. John F. Kennedy was a television special featuring the First Lady of the United States, Jacqueline Kennedy on a tour of the recently renovated White House. It was broadcast on Valentine’s Day, February 14, 1962, on both CBS and NBC, and broadcast four days later on ABC. The program was the first ever First Lady televised tour of the White House, and has since been considered the first prime-time documentary specifically designed to appeal to a female audience.
